title: My Hero Academia To End With Final Season In 2025
description: My Hero Academia fans have received confirmation that the anime adaptation will conclude with a final season set to air in 2025. This news follows ongoing discussions within the community regarding the future of the series after the manga's conclusion. Currently, the anime is in its seventh season, which will conclude on Saturday, October 12. A special event for the season's final episode will be hosted on YouTube, likely to provide further announcements about the anime's future, as reported by Screen Rant.The announcement originated from a promotional Jump pull-out called "My Hero Mass Media," which has been used previously to promote My Hero Academia-related media and merchandise. The promotional material features a straightforward message indicating that the final season will premiere in 2025. Fans have already shared the announcement widely on social media platforms. The announcement comes at a pivotal time for the franchise, as 2023 has seen the conclusion of several major titles within Shōnen Jump.Continue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: Fans look forward to closure as the anime adaptation approaches its conclusion.

My Hero Academia fans have received confirmation that the anime adaptation will conclude with a final season set to air in 2025. This news follows ongoing discussions within the community regarding the future of the series after the manga's conclusion. Currently, the anime is in its seventh season, which will conclude on Saturday, October 12. A special event for the season's final episode will be hosted on YouTube, likely to provide further announcements about the anime's future, as reported by Screen Rant.

The announcement originated from a promotional Jump pull-out called "My Hero Mass Media," which has been used previously to promote My Hero Academia-related media and merchandise. The promotional material features a straightforward message indicating that the final season will premiere in 2025. Fans have already shared the announcement widely on social media platforms.

The announcement comes at a pivotal time for the franchise, as 2023 has seen the conclusion of several major titles within Shōnen Jump.

As the anime approaches its end, the upcoming film My Hero Academia: You're Next will premiere on October 11. The seventh season will finish amid the Final War arc, with many fans looking forward to how the remaining storylines will be adapted for television rather than a film format.
